sections.Book series:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Blackmont is ruled by Lady Larra Blackmont as the Dornish practice equal primogeniture, allowing firstborn daughters to inherit and to pass on the family name instead of adopting that of their husbands.

Larra and her children are among the Dornish nobles that accompany [[Oberyn Martell]] to [[King's Landing]].

{{Quote|Not a man for welcome parties, our prince.|Lord Blackmont to [[Tyrion Lannister]]|Two Swords}}
'''Lord Blackmont''' is the head of [[House Blackmont]], a vassal house of [[House Martell]] of [[Dorne]]. He is played by [[Daniel Rabin]].
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 4]]===
Lord Blackmont is greeted by [[Master of Coin]]Â [[Tyrion Lannister]],Â outside of [[King's Landing]], when the latter is sent to welcome Prince [[Oberyn Martell]] and his entourage of [[Dornish]] lords and [[Knighthood|knights]]. The two exchange greetings, in which Lord Blackmont reveals Prince Oberyn has arrived the previous night, before he and the rest of the envoy proceed to the [[Red Keep]].<ref>"[[Two Swords]]"</ref>
